resolution.description: The product is working as designed.

components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.description:
Not sure if this is supported in the 4.2 release, or if a 500 response is intentional?
Opening to discuss. 
Thanks!
-M
